enam mehidi aya, lingika wichayanaya ha purushadhipathyaya erehiwa nagi sitiyaya..[9][10] samarsta anuwa lingika sthri wadi darshanaya, "nuthana darshanikayan ha nayakayin atharehi bahulawa pathira pawathna mathawadaya" wana atharama, eya "amarikanu kanthawan pidanayata pathwa athi apradhana pirisak" yana mithyawa matha randa pawathi."[11]emenma samarsge sama sthri wadaya, prathi-sthri wadi sankalpayak lesada wicharakayan wisin penna di atha.[12] 2012 eksath janapada janapathi mathiwaranayedi, mema sanwidhanaya owun ge web adawiyen saha deshapalana danwim pelak osse barak obama ta erehiwa wachika nagi sitimak sidu karanu labuwe , janapathithuman wanka premawanthayeku hata sama karaminya. .[

thisara @ obata wisheshayen sthuthiyi me sanwadaya niyama thanata genawata.thisara mewa samajaye nithara siduwana eeth kisiwek katha nokarana awasanawantha paththak.paya 24 ma ahanna labenne kanthawa pidanayata path wenawa kiyana eka.eeka thamayi wishala mudalak waya karala nadaththu karana mathawadaya.me siddhi kisima madhyayaka palawenne na.mewa widina aya dathmitikagena iwasanawa.samaharu siyadiwinasa gannawa.samaharu manasika leddu wenawa.adhipathi mathawadaya wela thibenne sthriwadaya.oya eka isddhiyakwath kisima madhyayaka pala karanna ba.oba nosithana abhyanthara balawegayak yatin thibenawa.namuth kollek ekka kellek yaluwunath kellage demawupiyo polisiye paminili kalama eeka athawarayak.sthri dushanayath athawarayak.me widiyata sankhyalekhana hadapuwama awuruddata mechchara dushanaya wenawa kiyala gana hadanawa.ethakota thathpareta ganu 9 k withara dushanaya wenawa.namuth 1995 di dapu darunu nithi walata anuwa ganiyek diha balimath athawarayak.me widiyatayi athawara wadiyi kiyanne.piriminta madhya balaya nathinisayi me wage siduwim wartha nowenne.piriminge demawupiyo papuwe amaru ahdila marunath siyadiwinasagaththath ee gana madhyawala pala karanna ba.namuth kantha hinsane kantha hinsane kiyala manthare wage mathuranawa.ee karanne kanthawanta thibena adareta noweyi.samajaye lingika wairayk wapurala pawul sansthawa winasha karala janagahanaya adukaranna.meka athhada balala sarthaka wuna deyak.wasari wasara wiwaha daru upath aduwenawa.wasarin awsara kantha sanwidhana walata labena prathipadana wadi wenawa.owun lingika wairaya wapuranawa,pawul kada ihirawanawa,samalingikathwaya janapriya karanawa.samajay sankara karanawa.owunge aramuna samajaya wisanwidhanaya karanna.kantha hinsana pramanayan bahutharayak mawa pam.ee wagema ihatha kiyapu siddhi wage dasa dahas gananak kiyanna kramayak nathi nisa kalaye walithalawen wahi yanawa.
